course details: SkillHigh offers Python, Data Science, Web Development, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing courses. Each course is designed by industry experts and includes hands-on projects.
pricing: Courses range from ₹5,000 to ₹25,000 depending on certification, duration, and specialization. Scholarships are available for eligible students.
internship: Internships available for Data Science, Web Development, and Machine Learning. Duration varies from 3 to 6 months. Stipends and certificates provided.
certification: All SkillHigh courses offer certification upon completion. Top performers receive special recognition and LinkedIn badges.
application deadline: Applications are open year-round for most programs. Some advanced courses have quarterly intakes.
placement assistance: SkillHigh provides placement support, resume building, and interview preparation for all students.
faculty: Courses are taught by experienced faculty from top tech companies and universities.
projects: Every course includes real-world projects and case studies to build your portfolio.
contact: For more information, email support@skillhigh.in or call +91-9876543210.
